oai_dc:dc.dc:title: XANES studies of the ND-SR-CE-CU-O superconducting system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PADALIA, BD
SINGH, OG
GURMAN, SJ
SUBA, K
PRAKASH, O
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: oxide superconductors
charge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We describe XANES studies of electron-doped superconductors based on neodymium cuprate doped with cerium. The mechanism for observed changes in the transition temperature on co-doping with divalent Sr is investigated using measurements of the Nd, Cu, Ce and Sr absorption edges.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 8th International Conference on X-Ray Absorption Fine Structure (XAFS VIII),BERLIN, GERMANY,AUG 28-SEP 01, 1994
